comment: I have empathy for my fellow human beings, these soulless creatures that manifest themselves as democrats are not human, but are evil incarnate, make plans my brothers and sisters, these vile beings will be, in the very near future, at our door and it is up to us to decide what we are willing to sacrifice to stop the insidious infection they will bring to us
amr:
# ::snt I have empathy for my fellow human beings, these soulless creatures that manifest themselves as democrats are not human, but are evil incarnate, make plans my brothers and sisters, these vile beings will be, in the very near future, at our door and it is up to us to decide what we are willing to sacrifice to stop the insidious infection they will bring to us
(a / and
      :op1 (e / empathize-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (b / being
                  :mod (h / human)
                  :mod (f / fellow)
                  :poss ii))
      :op2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h2 / human
                  :polarity -
                  :domain (c2 / creature
                        :mod (t / this)
                        :mod (s / soulless)
                        :ARG0-of (m / manifest-01
                              :ARG3 (p / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "Democrat")))))
                        :ARG1-of m))
            :ARG2 (ii2 / incarnate
                  :mod (e2 / evil)
                  :domain c2))
      :op3 (p3 / plan-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p4 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h4 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :ARG2 (b2 / brother)))
                  :op2 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h5 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :ARG2 (s2 / sister))))
            :location (d / door
                  :poss (w / we))
            :time (f2 / future
                  :ARG1-of (n2 / near-02
                        :degree (v / very))))
      :op4 (r / responsible-03
            :ARG0 w
            :ARG1 (d2 / decide-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                        :ARG1-of (s3 / sacrifice-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :purpose (s4 / stop-01
                                    :ARG0 w
                                    :ARG1 (ii3 / infect-01
                                          :mod (ii4 / insidious)
                                          :ARG1-of (b3 / bring-01
                                                :ARG0 c2
                                                :ARG2 w))))))))

comment: DJ, Nov. th and your day of Truth & Consequences draws nearer by the hour. Those early voters do NOT favor your side. Either way the 'vile, evil incarnate beings' are coming to a neighborhood near you soon. Like the Walking Dead, they cannot be stopped at the ballot box. Lock your doors. The Boogey Man , in his black majesty, is coming to a theater near you soon. ha

            :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01

                              :op1 "The"
                              :op2 "Walking"
                              :op3 "Dead"))))
      :snt5 (l / lock-01
